abstract: The Walt Disney Company’s top Internet executive, Steve Wadsworth, resigned late Thursday following a difficult tenure in which the media giant’s Web strategy underwent repeated retrenchments.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company’s top Internet executive, Steve Wadsworth, resigned late Thursday following a difficult tenure in which the media giant’s Web strategy underwent repeated retrenchments.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company’s top Internet executive, Steve Wadsworth, resigned late Thursday following a difficult tenure in which Disney’s Web strategy underwent repeated retrenchments.
